bug.author: mayaKaplansky
bug.summary: [üêõBUG] Error loading a config file in PyCharm
bug.description:
Hi I manage to run the model through command line, but when trying to get topK from here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RUCAIBox/RecBole/issues/506>#506</denchmark-link>
I must use Pycharm, then I altered the config code to be like this: <denchmark-code>if __name__ == '__main__': # Load config, dataset and model (if you have load these things, you can skip these codes) config = Config(model='GRU4Rec', dataset='Ofek',config_file_list='OfekConfig.yaml') </denchmark-code>
I located the yaml file in the directory of the project, and yet I get No such file or directory: 'O' When I look into the Config code, I see that for: for file in file_list: in configurator.py the iterator creates file=0 instead of the name I sent. Please advice, Maya. Thanks!

comments.comment: config file list need absolute path, already tested. like config_file_list = ['/data/prop/test.yaml', '/data/prop/test2.yaml']
